contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Explore my social media accounts, and feel free to connect with me on any platform. Let's get in touch and start a conversation!

home.message: Welcome to my portfolio. I'm Alan, a Full Stack developer specializing in the MERN Stack. This space is the result of dedication and passion, where each line of code tells a story of challenges overcome and innovative solutions. I invite you to explore and discover the digital world I've created. I hope your visit is inspiring, and may you have an excellent day.

about.message: Currently, I have knowledge in the field of web development, specifically in the MERN stack, and I'm applying these skills in various projects that test my capabilities. I am fully committed to programming, and I plan to add new skills to my stack, such as NextJS, SQL, and MySQL.
